Class.name: xobw.error.AbstractError
Class.Description: Abstract class extended by other error classes that are part of the HWSC error processing sub-system.

Property.name: errorType
Property.Description: Human readable name for the type of error

Property.name: text
Property.Description: Human readable text that provides information about the error

Method.name: display
Method.Description:
This method provides a simple display of the error using MUMPS WRITE commands.

Information displayed:
  • Class name
  • Properties:
    • code
    • text
Method.Implementation: write !,"Error Class: ",..%ClassName(1) write !,"Error Code: ",..code write !,"Error Text: " set i="" for set x=..text.GetNext(.i) quit:i="" write !?5,x

Method.name: decompose
Method.Description:
This method converts the error object properties into a traditional M array.
Structure of ARRAY returned ByRef: ARRAY("errorType") = type of error (BASIC, DIALOG) ARRAY("code") = error code ARRAY("text") = ARRAY("text",i..n) =
Method.Implementation: set error("errorType")=..errorType set error("code")=..code set error("text")=..text.Count() set i="" for set x=..text.GetNext(.i) quit:i="" set error("text",i)=x quit $$$OK
